description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has a requirement for two truck-mounted Hydraulic Soil Samplers, and one ATV-mounted Hydraulic Soil Sampler.
full_summary:
=====================================

## Solicitation for Hydraulic Soil Samplers
=====================================

**Title:** Hydraulic Soil Samplers
**Reference Number:** WS4087558711
**Solicitation Number:** WS4087558711
**Publication Date:** October 4, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 25, 2023, 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 15, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** May 24, 2024

### Tender Overview

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking to procure two truck-mounted Hydraulic Soil Samplers, and one ATV-mounted Hydraulic Soil Sampler.

### Tender Requirements

This tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP) and is open to all qualified bidders. The selection criteria is based on the Lowest Price. The procurement category is Goods and Services (GD).

### Tender Framework

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-User Entity: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia and Alberta

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Tender Contact Information

For further information or to submit a tender, please contact:

* Samantha Phelan, PSPC/SPAC - samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17627433?extsite=MTc2Mjc0MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
